ch0030_40_ran/0101_0701_01_10:
Have you decided on a wish for the star festival,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0030_40_ran/0101_0701_02_10: I really hope the stars make our wishes come true!
ch0030_40_ran/7101_0701_01_10:
It’s so hard to see the moon and stars at the
same time, isn’t it?
ch0030_40_ran/7101_0701_02_10:
There aren’t a lot of stars near the moon. Maybe
they’re shy?
ch0030_40_ran/7102_0701_02_10:
It’s pretty like the starry sky, isn’t it? So sparkly
and cute!
ch0030_40_ran/7103_0701_01_10: Have you ever seen Celesteela fly across the sky?
ch0030_40_ran/7103_0701_02_10: It’s so fast, it’s out of sight in a flash!
ch0030_40_ran/7103_0701_03_10:
If Celesteela were to race against fireworks,
I wonder which would win.
ch0030_40_ran/7104_0701_01_10:
I’ve been considering what I should wish for at
the star festival...
ch0030_40_ran/7104_0701_02_10: I’d like a big, cute plushie of Celesteela! Hehe.
ch0030_40_ran/7105_0701_01_10:
There are always so many festival stalls, I can
never decide which to line up for!
ch0030_40_ran/7105_0701_02_10:
And when I can’t decide, Tate and I line up for
separate ones and share what we get!
ch0030_40_ran/7105_0701_03_10:
If you can’t decide either, we can go halfsies too,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0030_40_ran/1701_0701_01_10:
Hehehe... This is a wonderful gift, just like
the stars!
ch0030_40_ran/1701_0702_01_10: I hope your smile continues to shine!
ch0030_40_ran/2501_0701_01_10:
Apparently at the star festival, if you write your
wish on a piece of paper and tie it to a tree, your
wish will come true!
ch0030_40_ran/2501_0701_02_10: Celesteela KINDA looks like a tree, so...
ch0030_40_ran/2501_0701_03_10:
If you have a wish, we can give the paper
to Celesteela!
ch0030_40_ran/2501_0702_01_10:
But let’s not tell anyone we’re giving our wishes
to Celesteela, OK?
ch0030_40_ran/2501_0702_02_10:
If everyone started giving Celesteela their wishes,
it’d tire Celesteela out!
ch0030_40_ran/2511_0701_01_10: I wonder if the stars and moon still shine up close.
ch0030_40_ran/2511_0701_02_10:
The other day, I reached my hand toward
the stars...
ch0030_40_ran/2511_0701_03_10:
and Celesteela tried to fly off and get them!
I panicked a little.
ch0030_40_ran/2511_0702_01_10: Shining bright whether they’re close or far...
ch0030_40_ran/2511_0702_03_10:
They’re a wonderful friend, earnestly listening to
my stories as we speak!
ch0030_40_ran/3001_0701_01_10:
I get hyped the morning of a festival, even before
it gets started!
ch0030_40_ran/3003_0701_01_10:
Everyone’s having so much fun! They’re fired up
just like the sun!
ch0030_40_ran/3005_0701_01_10:
I wonder which we can see more clearly tonight,
the moon or the stars.
